title: Ahri Merch Anouncment
body: When is the Ahri announcement going to happen? Will it actually be announcement this week like was mentioned last week. I am planning to order the Gnar and Hecarim figure before they go into the vault. I'm currently waiting for the announcement to place my order in case if it's the Ahri nendoroid returning in which case I'll add it to the same order if possible.

replies.body: I haven't been able to find any concrete dates on that myself quite yet either. Right now your best bet is just to keep checking the status periodically, but if I hear something I'll do my best to hop over here and reply!
